name: Royal Greatsword
desc: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It is made from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. A weapon for use by royals only.
skill_desc: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.
